/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A white building with a yellow roof stands prominently on the right side of the street, its vibrant colors contrasting beautifully with the blue sky above. On the left side of the street, a red car is parked, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image captures the essence of a sunny day in Beijing, with its blend of urban architecture and natural beauty.
